articles.title: The Magnetar That Forged a Planet’s Worth of Gold in Half a Second - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A powerful cosmic event from 2004—a gamma-ray burst from a magnetar 30,000 light-years away—has just been revealed as a major source of the universe’s heaviest elements like gold and platinum. Researchers have shown that this intense flare, brighter than anyt…
articles.content: One of the brightest explosions in our galaxy may have forged more heavy elements than we ever imagined. The 2004 magnetar flare is now confirmed to be a cosmic forge of gold, platinum, and other rar… [+6199 chars]

articles.title: Google’s Gemini chatbot gets upgraded image creation tools - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google's Gemini chatbot app now lets you modify both AI-generated images and images uploaded from your phone or computer.
articles.content:
Google’s Gemini chatbot app now lets you modify both AI-generated images and images uploaded from your phone or computer, the company said in a blog post on Wednesday.
